snippet: Britain’s biggest supermarket comfortably surpassed forecasts for Christmas sales, buoyed by lower prices, indicating that the company may be recovering from several years in turmoil.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s biggest supermarket comfortably surpassed forecasts for Christmas sales, buoyed by lower prices, indicating that the company may be recovering from several years in turmoil.

headline.print_headline: Strong Holiday Sales Show Possible Recovery For Tesco
headline.main: Strong Holiday Sales Show Possible Recovery for Tesco
